overview: Mr. Bill, the oft-victimized Play-Doh figurine whose frequent disfigurement by Mr. Hands was a highlight of the early years of Saturday Night Live, decides to reach for the brass ring of show business, with a typical level of success, in this collection of short subjects. Mr. Bill Goes to Hollywood features 20 short Mr. Bill sketches, and includes cameo appearances by Jay Leno and Bobcat Goldthwaith.
title: Mr. Bill Goes Hollywood
